title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: Datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed in a different format in dynamic text items and data/text items.
OB: When datetime values are retrieved from a table, they are displayed in a different format in dynamic text items and data/text items.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application. 2. Retrieve datetime values from a table. 3. Check if the datetime values are displayed differently in dynamic text items and data/text items.
